name: places/ChIJJ-wTF-RYwokRMyvdI5DqIa8
formattedAddress: 240 E 56th St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 240 E 56th St, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: I have had nothing but great experiences here. You can bring your laundry in first thing in the morning and you get it back same day. They are great at quick alterations - I’ve had her hem my suits (blazer and work pants) and dresses on multiple occasions. I’ve never had anything missing, stained, or ruined. It is also fairly priced in my opinion. If you need an easy wash and fold or quick alterations, this is a great place to go.

text.text: I have had nothing but great experiences here. You can bring your laundry in first thing in the morning and you get it back same day. originalText.text: Wow. I've seen some tough reviews here. I think they're great actually. I've only received great service from both owners and I'm surprised someone says they're racist since I'm quite dark skinned and I have been treated with the utmost of respect and kindness. They have fixed some very expensive garments of mine which I thought had no hope and they came through big time! If there's an issue, they're very honest and let you know what they can and cannot do. Great service, the location is organized and clean and if it's geographically convenient to you, they're a great place to take care of your clothes.

originalText.text: Very rude. Limited English proficiency. He got angry and told me to leave, because he was too busy mending a shirt to assist me. Disappointed and embarrassed, I left for another business.

text.text: Very rude. Limited English proficiency. He got angry and told me to leave, because he was too busy mending a shirt to assist me. Disappointed and embarrassed, I left for another business.

originalText.text: I personally have had nothing but great experiences with them. They seem very knowledgable regarding alterations and are always very efficient. I have had an expensive dress altered there and my roommate also has had several shirts and pants tailored by them without any problems.

text.text: I personally have had nothing but great experiences with them. They seem very knowledgable regarding alterations and are always very efficient. I have had an expensive dress altered there and my roommate also has had several shirts and pants tailored by them without any problems.

originalText.text:
DO NOT USE these people. The Asian man behind counter is rude and
does not speak English. Used to be good. The woman owner is much nicer. I asked to wash 2 night dresses and a pair of jeans. They dry cleaned and charged me $40.00. Ridiculous. They are super expensive and have crazy hours, delivery people quit everyday. Go to Mr Rapheal on the next block cheaper and more professional. Sorry they have lost their way and in this time of Covid 19 should be more professional and not needy and rude.
